sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Land Trust Successor Trustee Act.

sections.heading: Unless the land trust agreement specifically provides for an alternate
sections.text:
method of the appointing of a successor land trustee, the following
provision is applicable to all land trust agreements.

sections.heading: A land trust agreement may provide that the trustee, when directed
sections.text:
to do so by the beneficiaries of the trust or their legal representatives,
may convey the trust property directly to another trustee on behalf of said
beneficiaries, or others named by said beneficiaries.
